sentences.en: Each Finalist will receive a free trip to Barcelona for the Championship.
sentences.cn: 每位进入决赛的选手会免费获得去巴塞罗那争夺冠军的机票.

sentences.en: Guess who's a finalist for a huge research grant!
sentences.cn: 猜猜谁有可能得到一笔庞大的科研补助金!

sentences.en: KAREN BARLOW : Athens 50 - metres freestyle finalist, Michelle Engelsman, recently retired from competitive swimming.
sentences.cn: 雅典奥运会50米自由泳决赛参赛者MichelleEngelsman最近从竞技游泳项目上退役.

sentences.en: Milestone: All finalists will receive complementary awardspresent, travel allowances and Finalist Certificates.
sentences.cn: 转折点: 所有能参加决赛的选手均将得到纪念奖品 、 旅行津贴和决赛选手证书.

sentences.en: Mr. Hu was also a finalist for the Sakharov prize last year.
sentences.cn: 胡佳去年也入围了萨哈罗夫奖的最终候选名单.

sentences.en: One of finalist for IGF 2008 Game of the year award.
sentences.cn: 2008年独立游戏奖“年度最佳”评选最后单元入围作品.

sentences.en: She coached the 1994 55 m hurdles finalist.
sentences.cn: 她指导了1944年55米跨栏的决赛队伍.

sentences.en: She entered her project in the 2000 Intel Science Talent Search and was a finalist.
sentences.cn: 她带着她的项目参加2000年度的英特尔科学天才奖大赛并最进入决赛.

sentences.en: The twelve finalists will be listed in the Sunday Times.
sentences.cn: 这12位决赛者的名单将刊登在《星期日泰晤士报》上。

words.tran_cn: 最终的；决定性的；不可更改的
决赛；期末考试；当日报纸的末版

trans.tran_en: one of the people or teams that reaches the final game in a competition
